# This file is a part of gr-UTAT_HERON

#

########################################################################
# Setup library
########################################################################
include(GrPlatform) #define LIB_SUFFIX

list(APPEND UTAT_HERON_sources
    heron_rx_bb_impl.cc
    heron_rx_bb_impl.h
    heron_packet_manager.cc
    heron_packet_manager.h
    heron_packet.h
    debug_logger.cc
    debug_logger.h
    header_format_esttc.cc
)

set(DEBUG_FILE "${CMAKE_BINARY_DIR}/debug_log.txt" CACHE FILEPATH
"Log debug to this file when CMAKE_BULD_TYPE is Debug or RelWithDebInfo")

set(UTAT_HERON_sources "${UTAT_HERON_sources}" PARENT_SCOPE)
if(NOT UTAT_HERON_sources)
    MESSAGE(STATUS "No C++ sources... skipping lib/")
    return()
endif(NOT UTAT_HERON_sources)

add_library(gnuradio-UTAT_HERON SHARED ${UTAT_HERON_sources})
target_link_libraries(gnuradio-UTAT_HERON gnuradio::gnuradio-runtime gnuradio::gnuradio-digital)
target_include_directories(gnuradio-UTAT_HERON
    PUBLIC $<BUILD_INTERFACE:${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/../include>
    PUBLIC $<INSTALL_INTERFACE:include>
  )
set_target_properties(gnuradio-UTAT_HERON PROPERTIES DEFINE_SYMBOL "gnuradio_UTAT_HERON_EXPORTS")
target_compile_definitions(gnuradio-UTAT_HERON PUBLIC
    $<$<OR:$<CONFIG:Debug>,$<CONFIG:RelWithDebInfo>>:DEBUG_FILE="${DEBUG_FILE}">)

if(APPLE)
    set_target_properties(gnuradio-UTAT_HERON PROPERTIES
        INSTALL_NAME_DIR "${CMAKE_INSTALL_PREFIX}/lib"
    )
endif(APPLE)

########################################################################
# Install built library files
########################################################################
include(GrMiscUtils)
GR_LIBRARY_FOO(gnuradio-UTAT_HERON)

########################################################################
# Print summary
########################################################################
message(STATUS "Using install prefix: ${CMAKE_INSTALL_PREFIX}")
message(STATUS "Building for version: ${VERSION} / ${LIBVER}")

########################################################################
# Build and register unit test
########################################################################
include(GrTest)

# If your unit tests require special include paths, add them here
#include_directories()
# List all files that contain Boost.UTF unit tests here
list(APPEND test_UTAT_HERON_sources
qa_header_format_esttc.cc
)
# Anything we need to link to for the unit tests go here
list(APPEND GR_TEST_TARGET_DEPS gnuradio-UTAT_HERON)

if(NOT test_UTAT_HERON_sources)
    MESSAGE(STATUS "No C++ unit tests... skipping")
    return()
endif(NOT test_UTAT_HERON_sources)

foreach(qa_file ${test_UTAT_HERON_sources})
    GR_ADD_CPP_TEST("UTAT_HERON_${qa_file}"
        ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/${qa_file}
    )
endforeach(qa_file)
